Pametne mobilne telefone bomo kmalu brezžično polnili še hitreje!

03 Nov 2019, 07:54

Sodobni pametni mobilni telefoni za svoje delovanje porabijo veliko energije in za najbolj vnete uporabnike še tako zmogljiva baterija nikoli ne zadostuje za celodnevno uporabo. Ker gre za naprave, pri katerih moramo baterijo polniti relativno pogosto, nam to delo lahko precej olajša sistem za hitro polnjenje. Zato nas bo zagotovo razveselil novi telefon podjetja Huawei, ki bo opremljen z izjemno zmogljivim sistemom za polnjenje baterije, kar pomeni, da bomo lahko baterijo napolnili precej hitreje kot doslej.
Pametni mobilni telefon s sistemom za hitro polnjenje baterije bo novi Huawei Nova 6, in sicer različica s podporo za mobilno omrežje 4G. Ta bo namreč opremljen s polnilnim sistemom moči 40 vatov, ki bo znatno skrajšal čas polnjenja baterije. Povsem izpraznjeno baterijo zmogljivosti 4.000 miliamper ur bomo namreč dejansko lahko do polovice napolniti v zgolj 20 minutah ali manj, povsem napolnjena pa bo v največ 60 minutah, kar bo nedvomno odličen dosežek. Za primerjavo, 20 vatni brezžični polnilec lahko baterijo kapacitete 3.300 miliamper ur v 30 minutah napolni zgolj do 30 odstotkov.
Iz doslej znanih podatkov je še razvidno, da bo prihajajoči pametni mobilni telefon Huawei Nova 6 4G opremljen z dvema digitalnima fotoaparatoma in dvema spletnima kamerama ter značilno luknjo v zaslonu, namenjeno spletnima kamerama. Več informacij o pametnem mobilnem teflonu Huawei Nova 6 4G bo razkritih v naslednjih nekaj tednih, novost pa naj bi bila uradno predstavljan decembra letos.



Povezave: Huawei

We'll be charging our mobile phones faster even faster!

03 Nov 2019, 06:54

Modern smartphones consume a lot of energy for their operation, and for the most avid users, even a high-performance battery is never enough for all-day use. Since these are devices that need to be recharged relatively frequently, this can be greatly facilitated by the fast charging system. That is why we will surely be delighted by Huawei's new phone, which comes with an extremely powerful battery charging system, which means we can charge the battery much faster than ever before.
The smart phone with the fast battery charging system will be the new Huawei Nova 6, a version with support for the 4G mobile network. It will come with a 40-watt charging system, which will significantly reduce battery charging time. A fully discharged 4,000 milliamp hour battery can actually be fully charged in half in 20 minutes or less, and fully charged in a maximum of 60 minutes, which will undoubtedly be a great achievement. By comparison, a 20-watt wireless charger can charge a battery of 3,300 milliamps per hour in as little as 30 percent in 30 minutes.
It is clear from the information available so far that the upcoming Huawei Nova 6 4G smartphone will come with two digital cameras and two webcams, as well as a typical hole in the screen intended for webcams. More information on the Huawei Nova 6 4G smart mobile teflon will be unveiled in the next few weeks, with the announcement officially announced in December this year.
